readme:
linter-christen
=========================

This Atom linter plugin checks variable, function, and class names in source code according to a configurable naming standard.

[Code Complete 2] by Steven McConnell formed the basis for the default settings.

This code was originally forked from [linter-coffeelint]

## Installation
You must have the [linter] package installed to use this plugin. If Linter is not installed, please follow the instructions [here][linter].

[code complete 2]: http://cc2e.com
[linter-coffeelint]: https://github.com/AtomLinter/linter-coffeelint
[linter]: https://github.com/AtomLinter/Linter
